issue.title: [FCD] The definition of deadlock excludes cases involving a single thread

discussion.p: The definition of deadlock in 17.3.7 excludes cases involving a single thread making it incorrect.
discussion.note: 2010 Batavia Concurrency group provides a Proposed Resolution

issue.resolution:
Change as indicated:
deadlock
twoone or more threads are unable to continue execution because each is blocked waiting for one or more of the others to satisfy some condition.
